#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
     int tcase,n,i,sum;
     scanf("%d",&tcase);
     while(tcase--)
     {
          scanf("%d",&n);
          sum=0;
          if(n)
          {
          for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
          {
          sum+=1+(i-1)*8;
          }
          printf("%d\n",sum);
          }
          else
          printf("0\n");
     }
     return 0;
}
